nodes.text: A moon orbited the planet of Otavon XII, the homeworld of the Ovoni species situated in the Otavon system of the Hollan sector at galactic coordinates M-7. The moon orbited alongside another natural satellite. It could be seen during a clear sunset, and it orbited quite close to the planet. It hung over the world when Sith Lord Darth Vader fought an Ovoni Jedi Master named Hylon in 19 BBY during the Great Jedi Purge.
This moon briefly appeared in a 2010 comic book entitled Star Wars: Purge: The Hidden Blade, written by W. Haden Blackman and penciled by Chris Scalf.
